The item will be shipped within 3 business days once we confirm that your transaction is completed. If your payment cannot be confirmed within 7 days, your order will be cancelled. SHIPPING All items will be shipped from Japan. Bags, wallets, silver accessory, etc will be shipped via Japan Post's EMS or Postal Parcel. We will cover the shipping fee and the insurance. Jewelry and watches will be shipped via FedEx. We will charge a total of $100 for the shipping fee and the insurance. - Delivery time The item you ordered will be shipped within 3 business days after your payment has been completed.
